Name: Zeng Zhuo Feng
Text: V2.6 Version

Name: Lamia
Text: Eek!

Name: Lamia
Text: ...Red Tide Projection?
What's wrong?

Name: Lamia
Text: N-nothing. (Lillian's voice)

Name: Lamia
Text: Ah, bad signal. (Lillian's voice)

Name: Lamia
Text: Is that... Lithos?

Name: Lamia
Text: How many times... did he die here...?

Name: Lamia
Text: All the joints were... twisted...

Name: Lamia
Text: Some Lithoses looked... calm?

Name: Lamia
Text: Wait! I got spotted!

Name: Lamia
Text: Don't show up in Lithos' Red Tide Projection!

Name: Lamia
Text: It's like he is being born again!

Name: Lamia
Text: D-dammit! This is not happening, right...?

Name: Lamia
Text: E-earthquake?

Name: Lamia
Text: I've had enough of this! Ughhh!

Name: Lamia
Text: What is happening...? Ahhh...!

Name: Lamia
Text: I-is this an illusion? Is it Lithos' personal preference?

Name: Lithos
Text: Leave this to me. I don't care how many times I have to die.

Name: Lithos
Text: I'm the best material.

Name: Lamia
Text: What...? To let them kill you?

Name: Lamia
Text: The shadows get clearer... It's like his memory...

Name: Lamia
Text: Is this the way Lithoses transferred memories between one another?

Name: Lithos
Text: Sorry. I'm sorry, Dad. Sorry, sorry, Dad...

Name: Lithos
Text: It hurts... so bad... Please don't...

Name: Lamia
Text: AAAAGGHHH! What is happening? AAAGGHHH!

Name: Lamia
Text: Where's Vonnegut? Isn't he your agent?

Name: Lamia
Text: Ahhh... Forget it. Luna won't save me...

Name: Lamia
Text: A-anyway, let's get rid of these guys first...

Name: Lamia
Text: It's done... right?

Name: Lamia
Text: How many times... did he die here...?

Name: Lamia
Text: Falling down... Getting hanged...

Name: Lamia
Text: Shot dead...

Name: Lamia
Text: This wound... Did the Paper Crane do this? That is a punishment chair...

Name: Lamia
Text: Eek!
Severe M.I.N.D. corruption. Cannot use Signature Move now.
There is still a <color=#00CCFF>naval gun</color> that can be used on the ship.
Attack the torpedoes it launched to deal greater damage!
The Signature Move is disabled for now.
The enemy is on your <color=#FF0000>right</color>!
The <color=#00CCFF>naval gun</color> has struck its target!
The <color=#00CCFF>naval gun</color> has struck its target!
Ping Signal Orbs to fire!
You hit it! Good job, Lamia!
It must hurt him badly.

Name: Lamia
Text: Ugh... Such obsession with this place. Even the resonance constructed by Lithos is disrupted...

Name: Lamia
Text: ...My M.I.N.D... is fusing with the egg?

Name: Commandant's Voice
Text: Wake up! Lamia!

Name: Lithos' Voice
Text: Cthylla has been recycled. XX003 is still alive... Please save her, Mister.

Name: Vonnegut's Voice
Text: Her self-cognition is already in turmoil. Even if she's saved ▂▄▁▃▆▄▁

Name: Lithos' Voice
Text: Then let her forget these. I will make up a lie that she can accept...

Name: Lithos' Voice
Text: Let's give her a new name, not XX003 or Kana, but one that truly belongs to her.

Name: Vonnegut's Voice
Text: She reminds me of a bird that's good at camouflaging itself when it's little. Let's call her Cinderelik. Hope she will find her true self.

Name: Cinderelik's Voice
Text: I will complete this plan for Mister... So... let me be reborn by Mother.

Name: Lamia
Text: ...She still couldn't find herself.

Name: Commandant's Voice
Text: Don't get too caught up in the egg's emotions! Wake up! Lithos is on the way!

Name: Lithos' Voice
Text: Ah... You're here. The kid who stole Cinderelik.

Name: Commandant
Text: Noan!
05:19, Oct 11, 2089\nCity 57, Post-Pandemic Age Memorial Plaza
Boot Camp 5\nSimulation Pod Room\n05:19, Oct 11, 2069
Gestalt, Underground Tunnels, 1F\n05:19, Oct 11, 2069
Earth, Beyond the Atmosphere\n05:19, Oct 11, 2069

<size=27><color=#338889>Virtual space construction... Complete</color></size>
<size=27><color=#338889>Virtual battle data construction... Complete</color></size>
<size=27><color=#338889>Connecting to M.I.N.D... Complete</color></size>
<size=27><color=#338889>Connected to system</color></size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: So this is the virtual training space. Everything is so blurry...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Forget it. Make it quick.

Name: Backhaus
Text: Too slow. Did you fall asleep on the way?

Name: Watanabe
Text: I just wanted to give you more time to warm up.

Name: Backhaus
Text: Hahaha, good boy, I like how arrogant you are!

Name: Backhaus
Text: Take this!

Name: Backhaus
Text: Woah, that's quick!

Name: Backhaus
Text: Show me what you've got!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Then I'll pull no punches!

Name: Backhaus
Text: Incredible! Nice timing!

Name: Backhaus
Text: Nice, I'm impressed.

Name: Backhaus
Text: I'm gonna lose if I don't get serious. Hahaha.

Name: Unknown Voice
Text: ...Syncing... calibrating...

Name: Watanabe
Text: That's...?

Name: Backhaus
Text: Stay focused!

Name: Unknown Voice
Text: ...Deep dive...

Name: Unknown Voice
Text: Watanabe! Wata...

Name: Unknown Voice
Text: No response...

Name: Unknown Voice
Text: Keep going...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Another guy?!

Name: Watanabe
Text: What is it...?

Name: Backhaus
Text: What a rush!

Name: Watanabe & Backhaus
Text: HAAAAAA!

Name: Watanabe
Text: What is going on...?

Name: Watanabe
Text: This is...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Instructor and me?

Name: Watanabe
Text: When is it...?

Name: Watanabe
Text: System failure?

Name: Watanabe
Text: What?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Sneak attack?!

Name: Watanabe
Text: System logout!

Name: Watanabe
Text: It didn't work?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Dammit!
<size=32>Boot Camp\nSimulation Pod Room\n17:00, Apr 17</size>

Name: Soldier
Text: Good luck, rookie.

Name: Watanabe
Text: ... (Groans faintly)
His M.I.N.D. is reacting!
Keep it going! Enhance the connection!
Hey, ▅▃▆▅▂▄▁▆▇. How are you holding up?
It's not working. This is taking too long. Let's disconnect for now.
<size=32>Science Council, -1F\nGestalt Tunnels\n10:00</size>

Name: Nithart
Text: You have stopped for 20 minutes, soldier...

Name: Nithart
Text: It wouldn't even take 20 seconds if I were there.

Name: Watanabe
Text: You want us to carry your body to Gestalt?

Name: Watanabe
Text: I'll find the three terminals and get authorization ASAP. Calm down.

Name: Nithart
Text: Then please hurry up.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Remote assistance like this is the safest.

Name: Nithart
Text: But remote control is also the slowest.

Name: Watanabe
Text: This is a maze...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Where are you going?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Scanning?

Name: Nithart
Text: Terrain data of the area.

Name: Nithart
Text: All marked! Let's get going!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Now this is more convenient.

Name: Nithart
Text: Stop talking. We are not here to chat!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Those who failed to evacuate...

Name: Nithart
Text: This is Terminal B-1's circuit panel.

Name: Nithart
Text: Watch out!

Name: Nithart
Text: I'm impressed, soldier.

Name: Nithart
Text: Over there!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Can't you just be quiet...?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Other victims...?

Name: Nithart
Text: I guess they wanted to stop the corruption from spreading...

Name: Nithart
Text: Head to the area behind, soldier.

Name: Nithart
Text: The first rescuers reported missing...

Name: Watanabe
Text: They're already Corrupted.

Name: Nithart
Text: ...Please end it all, soldier.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Done...

Name: Nithart
Text: This is only the first one...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Deploy the cutter!

Name: Asimov
Text: —Jump success. How is it looking there?

Name: Teddy
Text: ...We have an upside-down city that looks like the Golden Age cities in the database.

Name: Asimov
Text: You're outside Gestalt's safe area. Be careful.

Name: Teddy
Text: Can you track the coordinates of the abnormal data again?

Name: Asimov
Text: I'm analyzing it. It's gonna take some time to pinpoint it.

Name: Asimov
Text: You can try moving forward in the meanwhile. The data should be located deeper inside.

Name: Teddy
Text: ...Are you serious?

Name: Teddy
Text: ...Does "deeper inside" really count as a direction?

Name: Teddy
Text: Hmm? What's this?

Name: Teddy
Text: Is this... the internal security program of this space?

Name: Teddy
Text: No... Wait. That's not right... Could this framework be... the data for environmental building?

Name: Teddy
Text: If we attack the data with codes...

Name: Teddy
Text: The environmental data of this space is starting to rebuild. Just as I expected...

Name: Teddy
Text: Another data cluster? It looks a bit different this time... Why the coincidence?

Name: Teddy
Text: If we link them together like this...

Name: Teddy
Text: Programs I've never seen before...

Name: Teddy
Text: It's a defensive data stream! Watch out!
<size=27><color=#CC99FF>>>>Environmental Data Collected\n>>>File B-1 Recorded</color></size>

Name: Teddy
Text: It's finally gone.

Name: Asimov
Text: Slight M.I.N.D. fluctuation detected... Should I terminate the immersion program now?

Name: Teddy
Text: That's not necessary. It's no big deal.

Name: Asimov
Text: I've got the coordinates of the abnormal data. It's a bit away from where you are. Move carefully.

Name: Teddy
Text: Copy.

Name: Teddy
Text: ...This is what you meant by "a bit away"?

Name: Teddy
Text: ...Do you seriously want a technician to take a route like this?

Name: Teddy
Text: Tsk... Did I trigger the defense system?

Name: Asimov
Text: Teddy—

Name: Teddy
Text: How annoying... I'm just a technician...

Name: Teddy
Text: What is it? That program was a hassle... We're about to reach the coordinates you sent.

Name: Asimov
Text: Copy that. Signal me immediately after you obtain the abnormal data around the coordinates. I'll start terminating the immersion program—

Name: Teddy
Text: ...How slow, Gray Raven Commandant.

Name: Teddy
Text: Hm? How can you be sure that it isn't?

Name: Teddy
Text: Um... It's a little bit unexpected for sure.

Name: Teddy
Text: Yeah, and you can't get out... Otherwise, why would I get trapped here?

Name: Teddy
Text: Some abnormal data stream has blocked the passage to the outside, and thus the communication. The source of it is probably the new "abnormal data" we are looking for.

Name: Teddy
Text: I've managed to track it. Find its location and we'll be able to leave.

Name: Teddy
Text: So trusting... I've got to show you what I'm capable of, then.

Name: Teddy
Text: ...You don't believe me? Have some trust in the professional!

Name: Teddy
Text: Finally detected the abnormal invasion? How slow.

Name: Teddy
Text: Hmph. Child's play...

Name: Teddy
Text: Is this... a data wall?

Name: Teddy
Text: This is weird... The structure of these codes is... completely different from that of the computing power lock...

Name: Teddy
Text: This is...

Name: Teddy
Text: This is it... Initiating data interception.

Name: Asimov
Text: Teddy—! Evacuate now! We've detected that your block module is about to collapse.

Name: Asimov
Text: I can't get your exact position, but I can turn on the emergency exit of the immersion program around you. Get out now.

Name: Teddy
Text: ...Running away isn't exactly a technician's expertise...

Name: Karenina
Text: TEDDY! We'll settle this after you get out!

Name: Teddy
Text: Hmm... Perhaps I should stay here instead.

Name: Teddy
Text: Hmm? That's unexpected...

Name: Teddy
Text: So this is the style of the Golden Age? This is...

Name: Teddy
Text: Done!
<size=27><color=#CC99FF>>>>Environmental Data Collected\n>>>File B-2 Recorded</color></size>
<size=27><color=#CC99FF>>>>Environmental Data Collected\n>>>File B-3 Recorded</color></size>
<size=27><color=#CC99FF>>>>Environmental Data Collected\n>>>File B-4 Recorded</color></size>
<size=27><color=#CC99FF>>>>Environmental Data Collected\n>>>File C-1 Recorded</color></size>
<size=27><color=#CC99FF>>>>Environmental Data Collected\n>>>File D-1 Recorded</color></size>

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier B
Text: Dammit. They're right on our tail...

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier B
Text: Hey, rookie! Use your machine gun to stop their approach!

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier B
Text: Hey, rookie! You'll overheat the barrel if you keep pressing the trigger!

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier A
Text: The Corrupted have boarded the convoy! We need backup!

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier B
Text: A large Corrupted! A large Corrupted has appeared!

Name: Hanying
Text: Oh, no!

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier B
Text: Dammit! Is this the end for me?

Name: Hanying
Text: There's no time! I need to save them now!

Name: Hanying
Text: Don't give up! Hang on, everyone!

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier B
Text: What the... How did you...

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier B
Text: All vehicles! Step on it!

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier B
Text: Look out!

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier B
Text: It can't hold on much longer! Forward!

Name: Hanying
Text: It's over!

Name: Veronica
Text: Heh!

Name: Hanying
Text: Veronica, stop!

Name: Hanying
Text: Time's running out. I have to hurry!

Name: Rebel Army Soldier
Text: That horn-head mechanoid is here!

Name: Veronica
Text: Get out of my way.

Name: Hanying
Text: This is bad. If things continue at this rate...

Name: Hanying
Text: Ha!

Name: Veronica (monologue)
Text: Heh, trying to stop me? Too bad I don't have the time to play along.

Name: Hanying
Text: I should be able to make it if I deal with them quickly.

Name: Hanying
Text: If Veronica activates Bifrost... peace between awakened machines and humanity will no longer be possible. I must stop her right now!

Name: Hanying
Text: That's strange... The elevator!

Name: Hanying
Text: I have to go after her. I can't let her activate Bifrost!

Name: Kyarantian
Text: You need to take out that turret before you can attack the mechanical worm!

Name: Kyarantian
Text: If you're short-handed, send in "Evening Bell Type VII" to handle it!

Name: Evening Bell X
Text: Tatyana, I'm here!

Name: Tatyana
Text: All this racket is driving me crazy! Everyone pipe down, I'll take care of this vermin myself!

Name: Tatyana
Text: Time for spring cleaning. Let's send them crawling back where they belong.

Name: Bionic Polar Bear
Text: (Weeping)

Name: Tatyana
Text: Hmm, their behavioral patterns really do mimic real polar bears.

Name: Tatyana
Text: But that's exactly why victory is already mine!

Name: Tatyana
Text: Phew! Easy peasy.

Name: Tatyana
Text: Who would've thought my old hunting skills would come in handy?

Name: Tatyana
Text: Though I must say, these mechanical ones are a bit trickier to deal with.

Name: Tatyana
Text: Corrupted industrial machinery, huh... Everyone, stay alert.

Name: Rosetta
Text: The Forest Guard will provide support. Engage with caution.

Name: Corrupted Service Mechanoid:
Text: Human... existence... is a threat... Must be... eliminated...

Name: Tatyana
Text: The corruption has made them completely forget their original purpose.

Name: Corrupted Service Mechanoid
Text: Cannot... process... human... behavioral logic...

Name: Corrupted Service Mechanoid
Text: Create machines... then destroy machines... Humans... truly are... grave threats...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Their neural circuits have been completely destroyed.

Name: Tatyana
Text: Then it's our final duty to eliminate them all.

Name: Nameless Test Subject
Text: I'll make you taste... the suffering I've endured!

Name: Rosetta
Text: Watch out! These attacks... He's not human!

Name: Rosetta
Text: Fall back! I'll handle these attacks!

Name: Nameless Test Subject
Text: You're just like me... a twisted will, drowning in betrayal...

Name: Nameless Test Subject
Text: Why not let them reap what they've sown?!

Name: Rosetta
Text: No! I'm nothing like you!

Name: Nameless Test Subject
Text: It doesn't matter... you'll regret this someday...

Name: Nameless Test Subject
Text: I'll be waiting for you at the end that you shall also reach...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Rest in peace. However, this is farewell forever.

Name: Tatyana
Text: Bugs? These Corrupted certainly have some peculiar forms...

Name: Tatyana
Text: Would setting them ablaze take care of them all?

Name: Insectoid Corrupted
Text: BZZZZZZ!!!

Name: Tatyana
Text: Whoa! Why are these things suddenly charging at us?!

Name: Diana
Text: Watch out! They're hiding in every corner of the city!

Name: Tatyana
Text: They really are living up to the name of "parasites"!

Name: Rosetta
Text: All hostile signals have disappeared. Well done.

Name: Tatyana
Text: I never want to see another bug in my life ever again...

Name: Unknown Corrupted
Text: Why... am I the only one denied happiness...

Name: Unknown Corrupted
Text: Have you all forgotten about me...

Name: Unknown Corrupted
Text: Why do you all look so happy together...

Name: Unknown Corrupted
Text: Don't just... decide am yourselves...

Name: Unknown Corrupted
Text: Stop ignoring me!

Name: Unknown Corrupted
Text: So quiet... At last... No more of that grating laughter...

Name: Rosetta
Text: How pitiful, her M.I.N.D. has been completely corrupted...

Name: Tatyana
Text: ...Let's give her a proper burial.

Name: Tatyana
Text: Tsk, the Corrupted have made it in here too.

Name: Corrupted
Text: (Weeping)

Name: Tatyana
Text: Sorry to say, but you're definitely not welcome here!

Name: Tatyana
Text: Hideous monsters that only know destruction and plunder...

Name: Tatyana
Text: You have no right to set foot on this land!

Name: Tatyana
Text: The ideals our forefathers fought for generation after generation...

Name: Tatyana
Text: I won't let vermin like you taint it!

Name: Tatyana
Text: This way... I can protect it all...

Name: Tatyana
Text: This Construct must be the "victim" Staessen mentioned...

Name: Tatyana
Text: It pains me to do this, but for her sake, let's end this quickly.

Name: Tatyana
Text: Is she... crying...?

Name: Tatyana
Text: I'm sorry. I'll end this battle quickly.

Name: Tatyana
Text: It's all over...

Name: Tatyana
Text: We... we made the right choice... right...

Name: Amberia
Text: Thank you... for hearing my voice... in these final moments...

Name: Amberia
Text: If even one person... can hear my voice... then it wasn't... all for nothing...

Name: Tatyana
Text: ...I'm sorry, we can't save you.

Name: Tatyana
Text: But we will live on, keeping all of this engraved in our memory.

Name: Tatyana
Text: More mechanoid guards... Looks like we've got another tough fight ahead.

Name: Tatyana
Text: Let's be careful. This will be a difficult battle.

Name: Diana
Text: The attacks are getting stronger!

Name: Tatyana
Text: I have to admit, such loyalty is admirable...

Name: Tatyana
Text: But this is a battle we cannot afford to lose!

Name: Tatyana
Text: This can't be... We... How could we...

Name: Tatyana
Text: I apologize, but please let us handle things from here.

Name: Rebel Leader
Text: Nothing but a bunch of cowards and lackeys! I'll drive you out for good!

Name: Tatyana
Text: Prepare for battle! The Border Commune shall prevail!

Name: Rebel Leader
Text: Haha, we shall see about that! Show me what you're made of!

Name: Yata
Text: Who?

Name: Yata
Text: That sound from earlier is coming from over there.

Name: Yata
Text: The door's open. Let's go check it out.
Incoming transmission...

Name: Yata
Text: Another transmission...
The ward... it's so dark... H-help...
The ward... it's so dark... H-help...

Name: Yata
Text: Shiva! Shiva! Where are you right n—

Name: Yata
Text: ...Stop... right there...

Name: Yata
Text: My M.I.N.D. is screwing with me... I can't move or do anything. Shiva, where are you?

Name: Yata
Text: The transmission mentioned a ward... She must be in the infirmary!

Name: Yata
Text: The statue... is ugly.

Name: Yata
Text: ...It's back to normal?

Name: Yata
Text: The buildings are all misplaced. Just how in the world can a statue do that?

Name: Yata
Text: Thought so.

Name: Yata
Text: The door's open. Someone's been here.

Name: Yata
Text: ...All these memos. Guess the school doctor wasn't exactly good at remembering things.

Name: Yata
Text: There's someone over there... Is that Shiva or an enemy?

Name: Yata
Text: ...Can't get in.

Name: Yata
Text: Gee... guess I made a little too much noise!

Name: Yata
Text: The door isn't broken? ...I can get in if I first go through here to go back to reality.

Name: Yata
Text: But the door is still locked. Gotta find the key first.

Name: Yata
Text: ...It's been so many years, and Yuka's name still fills the medical records...

Name: Yata
Text: Yuka has the key to the infirmary. I remember the school doctor gave it to her.

Name: Yata
Text: Can I find it, though? ...Anyway, guess I'll check out her classroom to see if I get lucky there.

Name: Yata
Text: An electronic lock, huh... Uhm, the doctor probably has a note around that tells himself what the passcode is since he isn't exactly good at remembering things.

Name: Yata
Text: An electronic lock, huh... I remember seeing this string of numbers somewhere in the doctor's medical records...

Name: Yata
Text: What in the world is going on?!

Name: Yata
Text: What in the world was that just now? Is it still trying to screw with my M.I.N.D.?

Name: Yata
Text: The thing is gone. Gotta go down before they're back.

Name: Yata
Text: That's Yuka's seat there.

Name: Yuka (Flashback)
Text: Yata, check out this little fox I made.

Name: Yata (Flashback)
Text: Cute! ...Uh, I mean, good job.

Name: Yuka (Flashback)
Text: Heh... This is about all I can manage anyway.

Name: Yata
Text: It's here again, when in the world...

Name: Yata
Text: Just get away from me already!

Name: Yata
Text: Again?!

Name: Yata
Text: Hah... hah... Did I lose it?

Name: Yata
Text: Phew... Good... Now then...

Name: Yata
Text: This is...

Name: Yata
Text: Shiva is not here. Gotta get out of here.

Name: Yata
Text: This fox mask... Yuka has one, too, I think.

Name: Yata
Text: "Don't stay in one place for far too long." I'm sure V would have said that if he were here.

Name: Yata
Text: Another hallucination. Is "she" behind it?

Name: Yata
Text: What kind of trial is it this time?

Name: Yata
Text: Tightly locked.

Name: Yata
Text: I could take this thing out with a single punch out there... Too bad this isn't reality.

Name: Yata
Text: Who's there?! Show yourself!

Name: Yata
Text: ...Yu... ka...? Is that you?

Name: Yata
Text: This place is far too big. If there's a key... where could it be hidden?

Name: Yata
Text: I think the slip said... "Enter the video?"

Name: Yata
Text: "I've been looking all over the place but can't seem to find a way out. Guess I'll enter the video and see what happens."

Name: Yata
Text: But... what does "enter the video" mean exactly?

Name: Yata
Text: Uhh... A deeper hallucination. Like a dream inside a dream?

Name: Yata
Text: I'm seeing so much image noise on my visual module... But then again, I'm not in the real world.

Name: Yata
Text: Gotta figure out how to unlock this thing...

Name: Yata
Text: Hmm?!

Name: Yata
Text: The layout changed... Is it because I'm watching a different channel now?

Name: Yata
Text: Let me try a different channel and see what happens.

Name: Yata
Text: Yikes... this is ugly.

Name: Yata
Text: I'll be taking this key, thank you.

Name: Yata
Text: The lock is in the TV... Is this how I'm supposed to open this thing?

Name: Yata
Text: Phew... two more left.

Name: Yata
Text: A chair?

Name: Yata
Text: The words are getting harder to read. I wonder what happened to whoever was writing it when they were writing it.

Name: Yata
Text: There we go again.

Name: Yata
Text: ...This is "one hell" of a welcome party.

Name: Yata
Text: What in the world is going on?!

Name: Yata
Text: Woah, they're all coming back to life! I'm outta here!

Name: Yata
Text: They've all been "reset"? Gotta be careful this time.

Name: Yata
Text: I'm keeping the second one. Thanks.

Name: Yata
Text: The layout changed again. What do we have this time?

Name: Yata
Text: What's this sound of bells?

Name: Yata
Text: This last key is definitely a no-brainer...

Name: Yata
Text: Is she behind this?

Name: Yata
Text: Why is she helping me, though?

Name: Yata
Text: There we go.

Name: Yata
Text: Hah, didn't think this would be easy at all.

Flipping through the tactical intelligence compilation, Chrome finds a surprising fact:\nThe sheer number of Constructs who participated in the "Mother" simulation battle is so vast\nthat the digits nearly overflow the screen's display width.
As a Construct who personally fought against Mother on the battlefield,\nChrome will review this campaign with you today.
"Let's do this together, Commandant."
"Using every resource at our disposal—no matter how many times it takes, I will deliver victory for you."
